word: THE TERM "DIVORCED MARRIAGES" WAS DEFINED AS MARRIAGES OF SPOUSES "WHO HAVE BEEN DIVORCED FROM THEIR FORMER HUSBANDS OR WIVES FOR OTHER CAUSES THAN THAT MENTIONED IN MATTHEW 19, AND UNDER THAT DIVORCE HAVE MARRIED AGAIN. SHALL SUCH PERSONS SUBSEQUENTLY EMBRACING PRESENT TRUTH BE RECEIVED AMONG US?" (RH OCT. 14, 1862.)
